column4: Also another anomaly of the Dual screen is some flash sites will not play in full screen they will have a large black box filling the screen and the video is the same size
has anyone else had this slow internet problem on 9.10?
has anyone been able to fix it?
not to my knowledge. you can surf the ubuntu forums
I have been doing that, I found one step that fixed it until I rebooted  but seems like it is affecting a large ammount of people
as with any new release, there are always kinks. just like the suspend issue on laptops
just gotta wait it out i guess bro
I have a laptop that 9.10 wont boot in is that what you mean?
yeah when you try to boot live cd or from update it just sits in black with a cursor blinking on my laptop
mahngiel:yeah when you try to boot live cd or from update it just sits in black with a cursor blinking on my laptop
yes, that is a huge issue atm . i've tried a few different kernels with no avail
ok I thought that was just me
there's a huge bug report with launchpad, i would recommend subscribing to it
I am going to reboot and see if taking my router out of the resolvconf file stays, if fixed the slow problem
